department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Repair and replacement of overhead doors
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 08 2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.\nA Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply of all labor, tools, equipment, materials, transportation and supervision for repair, maintenance and replacements of overhead doors is required by the Department of National Defence, 17 Wing Winnipeg, Manitoba, as detailed herein and in accordance with the line items identified at Annex Basis of Payment.

full_summary:
Tender Announcement Details
================================ ===

### Government Tender Announcement

**Amendment Notice**

Date de publication            : 2024-01-24
Source                          : Ariba Discovery

---

### Procurement Details

#### Contract and Tender Information

*   **Contract Number**                  : WS4248357146-Doc4248395404
*   **Contract Title**                   : W4M00-23-C348 Overhead Door Maintenance and Repair RISO
*   **Contract Reference**               : WS4248357146

#### Contract Scope

*   **Procurement Category**             : SRV
*   **Procurement Description**          : Building maintenance and repair services
*   **UNSPSC Code**                      : 72101500

#### Contract Period

*   **Contract Start Date**              : 2024-03-01
*   **Contract End Date**                : 2026-02-28

#### Competitve Process

*   **Tender Type**                      : Request for Standing Offer (RSO)
*   **Selection Criteria**               : Lowest Price

#### End-user Requirements

*   **End-user Entity**                  : Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **End-user Location**                : Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada

#### Offeror Requirements

*   **Compliance Criteria**              : Contractors must be compliant with all requirements as specified in the Statement Of Work
*   **Terms and Conditions**             : Contractors must adhere to all regulations specified in the annex basis of payment

-- Conclusion

The deadline for participating in this compromise via the quick bidding process has been rescheduled (modified) to February 8, 2024, 14:00 EST; Rather than the previously published chance. Bids submitted following said time will be considered non-responsive. It is evident that potential bidders must carefully study the details outlined above in order for a well executed bidding process.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have further questions or need translation assistance. Both bilingual!*pro*   
Let's work together. I reside in Sudbury Ontario. Would be okay to travel a bit. Hit me up!

### Dr Wilson Wilder -      
Hansel Hamm. B. Phil. everybody!*
